Class TabHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.element.basic.Element

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, IControlleroid, DeterminedSIMPLE_CLASS_NAMEd, Specifiable

    public class TabHeader
extends Element
    A tab header is the item of a tab in the header of a tab container.
